assignments.title: Math Worksheet - Addition
assignments.description: Complete pages 12-15 in your math workbook
assignments.instructions: Solve all addition problems. Show your work for full credit.

assignments.title: Science Experiment Report
assignments.description: Write a report about your plant growth experiment

submissions.submission_text: I completed all the math problems. Here are my solutions...
submissions.notes: I double-checked all my work and used different methods to verify answers.

submissions.submission_text: My science experiment showed that plants grow faster with more sunlight...
submissions.notes: I included photos and measurements in my report.
